description:
The 8th Servant, who was accidentally summoned in the 3rd war, appears suddenly as Bazett`s new Servant. His true name is believed to be Angra Mainyu, an evil spirit of Zoroastrianism. In truth, Avenger is simply a villager from centuries before whom was sacrificed out of a misguided fear that he embodied "all the evil of the world". Though he loves the world, his suffering makes him hate humanity.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Avenger
